item.description:
Huge screen (84") playing Carl Sagan's Cosmos all day.

Feel free to come and go as you like. Snacks will be provided.  

Location: Apartment 11-18B, at 100 Memorial Drive, Cambridge.

I wasn't savy enought to post a map on the interwebs... but it's pretty easy to google the location. You want to enter the lobby from Amherst street. The concierge will buzz you in. Tell him you are here to see Evan Maki in room 11-18B and come on up.

My cell phone number is 702-280-3583
item.how_to_find_us: Next to MIT Sloan Business center, and a short walk from Kendall/MIT T-stop.
item.name: Carl Sagan Cosmos Marathon
